title: Vazhkaiye Lyrics Haridas Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Vazhkaiye
Singer: Maalavika Manoj
Music: Vijay Antony
Movie: Haridas		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Vazhkaiye ini ungal kaiyil
indha ulagamey nam sattai payyil
naalai pattri naalaiku yosi
every body take it easy

oooooh oooh ooh ooooh
one more time
oooooh oooh ooh ooooh

Vazhkaiye ini ungal kaiyil
indha ulagamey nam sattai payyil
naalai pattri naalaiku yosi
every body take it easy

oooooh oooh ooh ooooh  ...
one more time
oooooh oooh ooh ooooh....

Unna suthu edhukku veli
ulagam pooraa irukku jolly
vazha therindhaal valigal iruku
vazhum valiyil padigal irukku

oooooh oooh ooh ooooh  ...
one more time
oooooh oooh ooh ooooh....

Vazhkaiye ini ungal kaiyil
indha ulagamey nam sattai payyil
naalai pattri naalaiku yosi
every body take it easy

Kanavu kaana kanna moodi
uzhaga azhagi unnaku jodi
a b c d ongappan thaadi
aeri ninna motham aadi

oooooh oooh ooh ooooh  ...
one more time

indha ulagamey nam sattai payyil

seo.description: Get the complete Vazhkaiye Lyrics Haridas Songs Lyrics from Haridas. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Vijay Antony and sung by Maalavika Manoj. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
